title: Widdop37
author: Widdop37
content: Who finds Console online gaming unfair? I love playing online games but consoles still charge to play online, I knew this after buying a series x console, is PC gaming any different? I was once a PC gamer but always play offline.

comments.author: eXPHorizon
comments.created_time: May 22, 2022, 10:51:25 AMLast edit: May 22, 2022, 11:47:55 AM by eXPHorizon
comments.body: PC Gaming is always better if your budget allows it. You can mod and have better texture quality than on Console. It is night and day difference ... However you have to spend 2k on a GPU and 600$ on a good CPU just so you can play at highest quality possible (4k) at 30 FPS

comments.author: bmwister
comments.body: I play epic, yes there are paid games and steam, but you can take them with discounts

comments.author: datguy
comments.body: It depends on the point of view. Maybe games on the console charge some money, but the console initially costs less than a good gaming PC, and by an order of magnitude. Therefore, I believe that the console is still better for games.

comments.body: Not everyone can sit in front of a PC to install games and drivers for hours before running a game, PC have some headache too like driver problems, games plugin missing and other instabilities but it all depends on users choice.
